General.Name: Recreate ASA
General.Description: Recreate ASA, a real estate company, focuses on the ownership, development, and management of commercial properties in Norway. The company develops office commercial properties, coworking, and technology solutions facilities; and rents office, retail, healthcare, and food and beverage properties. The company was formerly known as R8 Property ASA and changed its name to Recreate ASA in May 2022. Recreate ASA was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Porsgrunn, Norway.

6.Name: Ms. Elin Tufte Johansen
6.Title: Director of HR & Sustainability and Director
